feature.label: Erlang headless support
feature.description:
This feature provides Erlang IDE support for Eclipse, that can be used without an UI (headless).
For bug reports and feature requests, please use the trackers at https://www.assembla.com/spaces/erlide/support/tickets or at https://github.com/erlide/erlide/issues. You can also mail to erlide-devel@lists.sourceforge.net.
